overview:
Greg is an information technology executive, his field of expertise includes: executive IT leadership, large scale software applications development, and global business operations within Fortune 500 companies as well as within early stage businesses.

Mr. Toutoundjian has held senior management positions at Warner Music Group, as well as Citicorp, Merrill Lynch, and Waterford Wedgwood. He enjoys the challenges associated with helping businesses define innovative customer centric operational approaches and managing the development of applied technologies.
